page.title: 02FUND RAISING IN BUNGAY.
page.content: The Inner Wheel Club is attended by ladies of Bungay.They hold events such as coffee mornings,garden-parties,stalls and collections.The money goes to the N.S.P.C.C.,A.R.C. and Cancer Research. The Bungay branch of the Royal National Lifeboat Institution raises money by holding Flagdays and street collections to provide new lifeboats and equipment. The Bungay Lions Clubs have stalls at local fairs and hold small events.They provide help to all in need.They also offer holidays in their seaside caravan offer holidays in their seaside caravan for local residents especially the elderly and handicapped. Mrs "Dinky" Payne(M.B.E.), a local character, has a second hand stall in a pub car park.She has made money for many charities.
